name: WhatYOE Resume Cleaning Guide
description: Multi-step AI-powered resume extraction and cleaning process

workflow.overview: Extract resume data using multi-step AI calls for improved reliability and reduced hallucination

steps.name: Contact and Summary Extraction
steps.purpose: Extract basic contact information and professional summary
steps.prompt_template:
Extract contact information and professional summary from this resume:

=== RESUME TEXT ===
{resume_text}
=== END RESUME TEXT ===

Provide structured extraction of contact details and summary.

contactInfo.name: string - Full name of the person

output_structure.summary: string|null - Professional summary or objective statement if present

steps.name: Professional Experience Extraction
steps.purpose: Separate work experience from other experience types
steps.prompt_template:
Extract professional experience from this resume, categorizing into work vs other experience:

=== RESUME TEXT ===
{resume_text}
=== END RESUME TEXT ===

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE: Separate into:
1. Work Experience: Employment, internships, freelance work (paid positions)
2. Other Experience: Projects, volunteer work, research, academic projects, open-source contributions, hackathons, side projects

Be thorough and capture ALL experience types with specific skills and tools mentioned.

workExperience.startDate: string - Start date in YYYY-MM format
workExperience.endDate: string|null - End date in YYYY-MM format, or null if current
keyAchievements: array of strings - Key achievements and responsibilities

otherExperience.title: string - Title or name of the experience
otherExperience.experienceType: string - Type: project, volunteer, research, freelance, academic, etc.
otherExperience.startDate: string|null - Start date in YYYY-MM format
otherExperience.endDate: string|null - End date in YYYY-MM format, or null if ongoing
otherExperience.description: string - Brief description of the experience
technologiesUsed: array of strings - Technologies and tools used
achievements: array of strings - Key achievements and outcomes

important_notes: Do NOT calculate years of experience in this step
YOE calculation will be done job-specifically during evaluation
Focus on accurate categorization of work vs other experience

steps.name: Education Extraction
steps.prompt_template:
Extract education information from this resume:

=== RESUME TEXT ===
{resume_text}
=== END RESUME TEXT ===

Extract all educational background with degrees, institutions, and dates.

education.field: string|null - Field of study or major

steps.name: Skills Extraction
steps.purpose: Extract comprehensive skills categorized by type
steps.prompt_template:
Extract skills from this resume:

=== RESUME TEXT ===
{resume_text}
=== END RESUME TEXT ===

SKILLS: Extract all skills, tools, and competencies mentioned:
- technicalSkills: Any tools, software, technologies, programming languages, platforms, equipment, instruments, systems
- professionalSkills: Work-related competencies and abilities
- industrySkills: Domain-specific knowledge and expertise

Be thorough and capture ALL skills mentioned.

technicalSkills: array of strings - All technical skills, tools, software, and technologies
professionalSkills: array of strings - Professional skills and competencies
industrySkills: array of strings - Industry-specific knowledge and expertise

certifications: array of strings - Professional certifications and training

implementation_guidelines.ai_reliability: Use separate AI calls for each step to reduce hallucination and improve accuracy
implementation_guidelines.context_management: Each step focuses on specific data extraction to avoid token limit issues
implementation_guidelines.yoe_calculation: Years of Experience calculation is intentionally skipped - will be calculated job-specifically during evaluation phase
implementation_guidelines.skills_extraction: Be comprehensive in skills extraction as this data will be crucial for job matching
implementation_guidelines.date_format: Use YYYY-MM format for all dates to ensure consistency
